channel.title: PL/SQL on Ricky Leong

item.title: Guess the Country
item.description:
The goal of Guess the Country is, funnily enough, in the name. This was built during a time where I would do the Worldle on the daily. The most rewarding part was extracting all the different countries’ svg images - this part was done using the C# HttpClient. Give it a try - a new country appears everytime you load the page ðŸ˜Š

[The image used is royalty-free from https://pixabay.com/vectors/world-geography-map-globe-earth-36479/]
